alert.note: Alert for Cleburne (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 15 at 6:56PM CDT until April 16 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WOODRUFF...CENTRAL INDEPENDENCE...SOUTHERN RANDOLPH...JACKSON...SOUTHEASTERN CLEBURNE...NORTHEASTERN WHITE... LAWRENCE AND SOUTHEASTERN SHARP COUNTIES... At 655 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Portia to near Cash to 9 miles northwest of Tupelo, moving east at 45 mph. This storm recently produced a 57 knot wind gust at the Newport observation site in Jackson County. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Newport... Walnut Ridge... Hoxie... Black Rock... Lake Charles State Park... Tuckerman... Diaz... Newark... Swifton... Pangburn... College City... Portia... Grubbs... Pleasant Plains... Strawberry... Lynn... Oil Trough... Jacksonport... Magness... Tupelo... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
